meaningMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an い on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>shame</kanji>? It could be <vocabulary>ashamed</vocabulary> or even <vocabulary> embarrassing</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: When you're <vocabulary>ashamed</vocabulary> it's even worse when someone laughs at you: <reading>ha</reading> (は) ha ha!"
